data.name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Paint of War
data.detailed_description:
War is a skilled artist who paints on the bodies of those who fight in it. By looking at these drawings, one can easily distinguish between a veteran of the crusades and a green recruit.

This free DLC includes:
Additional options for customizing the character's appearance: new types of tattoos, and body art, and the ability to change eye color.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This free DLC includes additional options for customizing the character's appearance: new types of tattoos, and body art, and the ability to change eye color.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-2310M CPU @ 2.10GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940M
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 CPU 920 @ 2.67GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core M-5Y51 @ 1.10GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400T @ 1.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
